headline: Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (EW): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (EW) on DIY Investor’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on EW. Edwards Lifesciences Corporation (EW)’s share was trading at $75.8 as of 10th June. EW’s trailing and forward P/E were 31.55 and 31.25 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: BSX Raises 2025 Financial Outlook: What's Backing It?
summary: Boston Scientific lifts its 2025 sales and EPS outlook after a strong Q1, with cardiology and EP segments fueling major gains.
